properties.description: This is daily trigger for the Audit Job to run. This must run afer the Oracle Jobs that populate the tables

activities.name: Lookup Bank Holidays
activities.description: Return the most recent England bank holiday.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT MAX([Date]) 'Date'
FROM [Core].[BankHolidays]
WHERE [Country] = 'England'
	AND [Date] < GETDATE()

dependsOn.activity: Execute Drop RAW GL Tables Script

activities.name: Execute BLOB To SQL For Oracle Data
Execute SQL To Blob For Trade Tables
Execute Drop RAW GL Tables Script

dependsOn.activity: Execute BLOB To SQL For Oracle Data
